summary: 0 new issues. Documentation changes correctly address Round 1 findings (M1-M4). ON CONFLICT pattern remains correct. Cross-layer dependencies properly wired.

M1_race_condition_comment.note: Clear comment explaining Issue #176 race condition handling and ON CONFLICT pattern

M2_get_by_signature_docstring.note: Expanded docstring with Issue #176 reference explaining why graduated orphans are returned

M3_cross_reference_comment.note: Cross-reference to orphan_matcher.py with file:line reference for parallel implementation

M4_stories_appended_comment.note: Multi-line comment explaining post-graduation routing and counter semantics

correctness_verification.on_conflict_pattern: VERIFIED - orphan_service.py:113 uses ON CONFLICT (signature) DO NOTHING, correctly handles race without transaction abort
correctness_verification.create_or_get_fallback: VERIFIED - orphan_service.py:130-147 fetches existing row on conflict with same cursor for read consistency
correctness_verification.post_graduation_routing: VERIFIED - orphan_matcher.py:318-323 routes to story or updates orphan based on graduated_at state
correctness_verification.evidence_service_wiring: VERIFIED - orphan_integration.py:92,100 creates and passes EvidenceService to OrphanMatcher
